MAIN_MESSAGE: This is a message for customers in the KY1 postcode area of Kirkcaldy. It is necessary for our engineers to carry out a shutdown at 6:00pm to remove generators onsite and connect customers back on to the mains and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 9:00pm. We will update this message if this information changes We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 10:23am on Thursday, 10 December 2020
